stimulus_set: 12 prime-target pairs per stimulus set (each target with each prime)
target_word pairs for stimulus sets 1-4 presented in ascending prime order (1.1 - 3.2)
target_word pairs for stimulus sets 5-7 presented in descending prime order (3.2 - 1.1)
nontarget_word pairs for stimulus sets 1-4 presented in descending prime order (3.2 - 1.1)
nontarget_word pairs for stimulus sets 5-7 presented in ascending prime order (1.1 - 3.2)
